title: kAma janaka
sahitya:
kAma janaka ripugaN amadahara kAmita tAnalOla paripAhi cArumukha


anupallavi

  bhUmIramAdi nAda bhOgi bhOga shayanAdi mEcaka vibhO munIndratata sEvya padayuga


caraNam 1    pATalaja pAdharAnakha bhAnu shashAnka lOcana hATakOpamita 
cEla  bhUri rucihAra shObhita gaLAmbuja lOcana
    caraNam 2    mOhana kirITa bhAsita mOdakarAtma bhASaNa dEhalAlasita 
divya candana su-dIna lOka paripAla nAticaNa
    caraNam 3    vAraNa samAnayAna nivArita pApa sancayabhatayIsha mada 
nAshakAdi guNa pamanAbha dhrta shankha cakradhara
